data.message: If it isn't broke don't fix it! Many of your updates create issues and take away things which were once enjoyed.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Jeremy. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2c2vhCL. -Jessica
Can you help me? I can't use the search feature at all. On any mobile device via app or browser. Very frustrating, that's how I look up companies now as most just update their fb.
Hi Lora. If something's not working, you can report it. Reports from people on Facebook help us identify and fix problems. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2cmoJf2. -Brittany
LI  trust me on thsio oen but FB just does not care abnout your problems as long as you keep using their service to they can sell adds and your personal data..
I've done that. Apparently it's just me that can't search. I ask friends yesterday. I can't search on the app or on mobile browser even when I force it to desktop mode.
I had to go to Google and type Facebook's facbook page in order to post things here yesterday.
